sys_ui_message.key: The g_form.getValue can only read fields on the form. Since you are looking for a field of the reference field on your form, we must first get the record information from the server and then we have access to any fields for the reference field.\\n var my
sys_ui_message.message: The g_form.getValue can only read fields on the form. Since you are looking for a field of the reference field on your form, we must first get the record information from the server and then we have access to any fields for the reference field.\\n var my_field_value = g_form.getReference('name_of_your_reference_field',getmyfieldvalue);\t \tfunction getmyfieldvalue(my_field_value) { \t\talert (my_field_value.name); \t}
sys_ui_message.sys_name: The g_form.getValue can only read fields on the form. Since you are looking for a field of the reference field on your form, we must first get the record information from the server and then we have access to any fields for the reference field.\\n var my
